00054   
00055   class SaveDoneEvent;
00056   friend class SaveDoneEvent;
00057 
00058   inline SaveDoneEvent* saveDoneEvent(bool status){
00059     return new SaveDoneEvent(*this,status);
00060   };
00061 
00067   class SaveDoneEvent : public QCustomEvent{
00068    //Only the method saveDoneEvent of SaveThread has access to the private part of SaveDoneEvent,
00069    //the constructor of saveDoneEvent being private, only this method con create a new saveDoneEvent
00070    friend SaveDoneEvent* SaveThread::saveDoneEvent(bool status);
00071 
00072   public:
00073     inline bool isItSaveAs(){return saveThread.isSaveAs;};
00074     inline void setTemporaryFile(QString tmpFile){tempCluFile = tmpFile;};
00075     inline QString temporaryFile(){return tempCluFile;};
00076     inline bool isSaveOk(){return saveOk;};
00077     inline ~SaveDoneEvent(){};
00078     
00079   private:
00080     SaveDoneEvent(const SaveThread& thread,bool status):QCustomEvent(QEvent::User + 100),saveThread(thread),saveOk(status){};
00081     
00082     const SaveThread& saveThread;
00083     QString tempCluFile;
00084     bool saveOk;
00085   };
00086
